channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Security and Compliance Center Workload Protection (sysdig-secure) has changed the description of the plan named free-trial
item.description:
*before*: Free for 30 days. Free trial plans with the data are deleted after 30 days after expiration. Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster. However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans, *after*: Free for 30 days. Free trial plans with the data are deleted after 30 days after expiration. Note the Workload Protection agent and the IBM Cloud Monitoring agent cannot be deployed on the same cluster.
However, you can access Workload Protection functionality through IBM Cloud Monitoring by selecting the Graduated Tier - Sysdig Secure + Monitor plan. For more information refer to: https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/monitoring?topic=monitoring-service_plans

item.title: [lifecycle] VMware as a Service (vmware.directorsite) moved from Beta to Production Ready
